title: James Rodriguez told to rip up his Everton contract and follow Willian example
description: James Rodriguez was linked with a move away from Everton this summer but remains at Goodison Park

title: India’s first building made of bio-bricks at IIT-Hyderabad is a great example of ‘wealth from waste’
description: Developed to counter the air pollution caused by stubble burning, bio-bricks cost only about Rs 2-3 when mass-produced and can be an extra source of income for marginal farmers
